page.title: 04A Day in my Life:L.Dodgshon.
page.content: I woke up at 7.30a.m,had breakfast and got ready for school.We drove in our Austin Montego to my sister's secondary school.I played the violin with the school orchestra in assembly. We sang Welsh and English hymns.Before break we had a Middle English television programme,after break we did Maths and had another television programme called "Animals in Action". For lunch we had chips,coleslaw and pizza followed by strawberry angel delight. After lunch break we did a science experiment about our breathing.I then had a violin lesson during last break, before our Welsh lesson.After school I practiced with the school orchestra for a concert.At home I had an early supper infront of the television and watched "Connections".I went to choir practice in Llanfarian before bed.
